title: Cold Chisel - The Live Tapes Vol 2
description:
The second volume of Cold Chisel's "Live Tapes" series, and the first to contain archival material. According to Don Walker, "the performance was to be broadcast live on radio, which is why these tapes exist and survive." All but three of the tracks are from their then-latest album, "Breakfast At Sweethearts". Only took 35 years for this to see the light of day.

In lossless FLAC format with ReplayGain metadata.

Recorded live at Bombay Rock, Melbourne April 27, 1979.

All songs written by Don Walker except where noted.

01. Shipping Steel
02. Home and Broken Hearted
03. Dresden [Ian Moss/Don Walker]
04. Conversations
05. Showtime
06. The Door
07. Breakfast at Sweethearts
08. Plaza
09. One Long Day
10. Merry-Go-Round
11. Wild Thing [Chip Taylor]
12. Goodbye (Astrid Goodbye) [Don Walker/Jimmy Barnes]
